snippet.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 | First Look Gameplay
snippet.description:
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is our turn-based RPG incorporating real-time elements, focusing on a unique journey to stop The Paintress from ever painting death again.

In this early preview of the game’s initial stages, you will get a first look at gameplay in Flying Waters, a mysterious region where Gustave and Lune search for their missing companion, Maelle. 

We are a small and passionate team,  and we're dedicated to creating an experience that both honours classic RPGs and pushes boundaries in new ways that haven’t quite been done before. 

We can't wait to show you more. 

Wishlist now and sign up on our website to unlock exclusive rewards: https://www.expedition33.com/linkhub
